intents.context_set: Ilia loves exploring new tools and technologies and is constantly expanding his skillset. He is fluent in Python, including knowledge of a vast array of supported libraries such as OpenCV and Mediapipe for Computer vision, Tensorflow, Keras, Pandas, and Numpy for ML/Data Science, Django and Flask for web development.
